sentences.en: a hitherto unknown species of moth
sentences.cn: 迄今仍属未知种类的蛾

sentences.en: a species of fish hitherto unknown in the West
sentences.cn: 迄今在西方还不为人知的一种鱼

sentences.en: All Utopias that have hitherto been constructed are intolerably dull.
sentences.cn: 到现在为止,一切虚构出来的乌托邦都是愚蠢不堪的.

sentences.en: Doctor Percival had struck him hitherto as a very genial man.
sentences.cn: 珀西瓦尔医生给他的印象一直是个和蔼可亲的人.

sentences.en: Hitherto Barchester had escaped the taint of any extreme rigour of church doctrine.
sentences.cn: 顶到这时候为止,巴彻斯特一直逃脱了任何极端严厉的教条的污染.

sentences.en: Hitherto he had experienced no great success in his attempt.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,他的尝试还没获得成功.

sentences.en: Hitherto I have gone on vague lines.
Hitherto, the main emphasis has been on the need to resist aggression.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，一直重点强调的是要抵抗侵略。

sentences.en: I had hitherto continued to board with Godfrey.
sentences.cn: 迄今我仍在戈费雷处用膳.

sentences.en: Our whole hearts revolt against the way women have hitherto been treated.
sentences.cn: 我们对妇女迄今所受的待遇从心底里感到厌恶.

sentences.en: She has hitherto been relatively nice to me.
That suggests the neurological changes which gave rise to humanity may have predated the brain's expansion—an event that had, hitherto, been regarded as crucial to the emergence of humans.
sentences.cn: 这表明，人类产生所依赖的大脑神经上的变化，有可能在大脑变大之前就已经出现，这也是迄今为止被认为是人类诞生的关键因素。

sentences.en: The helicopter is the first in the world to be designed to serve three hitherto very distinct markets.
sentences.cn: 这款直升机是世界上首批为满足3个迄今为止完全不同的市场而设计的机型。

sentences.en: The polytechnics have hitherto been at an unfair disadvantage in competing for pupils and money.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，理工专科学校在争取生源和资金方面一直处于劣势。

sentences.en: This latter way is the true one, but hitherto untried.
sentences.cn: 这后一种方法是真实的, 但尚未有人试用过.

sentences.en: Thomson said the telephone was " the greatest marvel hitherto achieved by the electric telegraph ".
sentences.cn: 汤姆森评价说,电话是 “ 迄今为止电报业所实现的最令人惊奇的发明 ”.

sentences.en: We must consider what conception of electricity had been formed hitherto.
sentences.cn: 我们必须仔细思量一下迄今为止已形成的电的概念是什么.
